EmailTemplate.name: Furniture Solutions for 2018-19 by Lorell
EmailTemplate.subject: Furniture Solutions for 2018-19 by Lorell
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName},
Why Lorell?
At Lorell our mission is to create solutions that work for you, not only in function, style, and quality but also in price. Out product line is continuously expanding with solutions and products that make sense in today's classrooms and offices from the front to the back.
All of our products are tested and certified to meet or exceed ANSI/BIFMA standards.
All of our products are backed by a Lorell Warranty.
All of the furniture listed in all 3 flyers are on sale through September 30, 2018. Please reach out to me for your classroom needs. I look forward to hearing from you.
Regards,
{!User.Name}
Account Manager
{!User.Email}
(855)DEPOT11 ext. {!User.ISO_Extension__c}
https://business.officedepot.com
Customer Service: (888) 263-3423
